scripts.build:ui: @powershell New-Item -ItemType Directory dist -Force && @powershell Remove-Item -Recurse -Force dist && cd ../../../fullstackcourse/part3/notes/ && npm run build && @Powershell Copy-Item -recurse dist ../../../fullstackcourse-backend/part3/noteserver/dist
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push
